meaningMnemonic: Only a <radical>tree</radical> with <radical>eye</radical>s and a <radical>heart</radical> has the ability to <kanji>imagine</kanji> and to <kanji>contemplate</kanji>. For a tree to imagine and contemplate things, it needs eyes to see and a heart to feel.
readingMnemonic: If a <radical>tree</radical> can <kanji>imagine</kanji>, it likely has a <reading>soul</reading> (そう). Its soul is what makes it possible for the tree to <kanji>contemplate</kanji> things, you see?
